subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: At the end of this 2014 season, the elite series has a lopsided grid, with a handful of elite teams at the top, followed by all the rest rather than a few midlevel teams.
snippet: At the end of this 2014 season, the elite series has a lopsided grid, with a handful of elite teams at the top, followed by all the rest rather than a few midlevel teams.
